articles.title: Streamer Ibai Obliterates Twitch Record for Highest Concurrent Viewers - IGN
articles.description: Twitch user Ibai Llanos has broken the streaming platform's record for the most concurrent viewers for his La Velada del Año II event that included boxing matches with YouTuber Spursito, streamer AriGameplays, singer David Bustamante, and more.
articles.content:
Twitch user Ibai Llanos has broken the streaming platform's record for the most concurrent viewers.

articles.title: High on Life - Guy in a Hole Animated Short - IGN
articles.description:
Check out this new animated short from High on Life, the upcoming game from Rick & Morty co-creator Justin Roiland's Squanch Games.

High On Life launches on PC (via Steam and the Epic Games Store) and Xbox Series X/S on October 25, 2022.

articles.title: Christian Bale Would Only Play Batman Again If Christopher Nolan Returned to Direct - IGN
articles.description: Christian Bale has revealed that he would only return to play Batman if Christopher Nolan asked him to reprise the role.
